SELECT m.mem_id, l.like_no, l.like_regtime, l.post_no, p.post_title, p.post_category, p.post_regtime, p.post_city, p.post_hits, p.post_plan_date FROM MEMBERS m LEFT JOIN LIKES l ON m.mem_no = l.liker_mem_no AND l.like_del_check=FALSE AND l.like_type = 1 LEFT JOIN POST p ON l.post_no = p.post_no AND p.post_del_check=FALSE WHERE m.mem_no = #{mem_no} AND m.mem_del_check = FALSE ORDER BY l.like_regtime DESC;

SELECT m.mem_id, l.like_no, l.like_regtime, h.hp_no, h.hp_name, h.hp_theme, h.hp_tag, h.hp_address, h.hp_detail_adr, h.hp_content, h.hp_homepage, h.hp_holiday, h.hp_fee, h.hp_img FROM MEMBERS m LEFT JOIN LIKES l ON m.mem_no = l.liker_mem_no AND l.like_del_check=FALSE AND l.like_type = 2 LEFT JOIN HOTPLACE h ON l.hotplace_no = h.hp_no AND h.hp_del_check=FALSE WHERE m.mem_no = #{mem_no} AND m.mem_del_check = FALSE ORDER BY l.like_regtime DESC;

SELECT m.mem_id, l.like_no, l.like_regtime, f.fval_no, f.fval_name, f.fval_theme, f.fval_tag, f.fval_address, f.fval_detail_adr, f.fval_content, f.fval_homepage, f.fval_start_day, f.fval_end_day, f.fval_fee, f.fval_host, f.fval_img, f.fval_ended FROM MEMBERS m LEFT JOIN LIKES l ON m.mem_no = l.liker_mem_no AND l.like_del_check=FALSE AND l.like_type = 3 LEFT JOIN FESTIVAL f ON l.festival_no = f.fval_no AND f.fval_del_check=FALSE WHERE m.mem_no = #{mem_no} AND m.mem_del_check = FALSE ORDER BY l.like_regtime DESC;

SELECT m1.mem_no AS MY_NO, m1.mem_id AS MY_ID, m1.mem_name AS MY_NAME, m2.mem_no AS FOLLOW_NO, m2.mem_id AS FOLLOW_ID, m2.mem_name AS FOLLOW_NAME FROM MEMBERS m1 LEFT JOIN FOLLOW f ON m1.mem_no = f.follower_no LEFT JOIN MEMBERS m2 ON f.following_no = m2.mem_no WHERE m1.mem_no = #{mem_no:INTEGER} AND f.follow_del_check = FALSE AND m2.mem_del_check = FALSE AND m1.mem_del_check = FALSE;

SELECT f.following_no, m2.mem_no AS MY_NO, m2.mem_id AS MY_ID, m2.mem_name AS MY_NAME, m1.mem_no AS FOLLOW_NO, m1.mem_id AS FOLLOW_ID, m1.mem_name AS FOLLOW_NAME FROM MEMBERS m1 LEFT JOIN FOLLOW f ON m1.mem_no = f.follower_no LEFT JOIN MEMBERS m2 ON f.following_no = m2.mem_no WHERE m2.mem_no = #{mem_no:INTEGER} AND f.follow_del_check = FALSE AND m2.mem_del_check = FALSE AND m1.mem_del_check = FALSE;
